message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to you, and I believe it's an excellent value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. Let me know if this works for you!
Thank you for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm looking to pay closer to $100 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I propose we settle on $105 for the product. Let me know if this is acceptable.
